B

Battleship - Class in Game
Main class for the game Battleship
Battleship() - Constructor for class Game.Battleship
 

G

Game - package Game
These classes contain all the UI and backend logic for the Battleship game.
Game.Logic - package Game.Logic
These classes contain the game's logic and manage it.
Game.UI - package Game.UI
These classes create and manage the UI for the Battleship game
GameState - Class in Game.Logic
This class tracks the state of a grid for either the player or the system.
GameState(LogPanel, int) - Constructor for class Game.Logic.GameState
Constructs a fresh state of the Battleship game and initializes an empty grid
getGrid() - Method in class Game.Logic.GameState
Returns the grid containing the current state of the game
getLetterCoordinate(Integer) - Static method in class Game.Utils
Returns the letter equivalent of a numeric coordinate
GridPanel - Class in Game.UI
 
GridPanel(GameState) - Constructor for class Game.UI.GridPanel
Default constructor for creating a GridPanel
GridSquare - Class in Game.Logic
Represents a square on the battleship grid

I

initializePanel() - Method in class Game.UI.LogPanel
Initializes the window containing a scrollable text box for the game's history log
initializePanel() - Method in class Game.UI.OptionsPanel
Initializes the options panel by creating the UI elements for selecting options
initializePanel(int, boolean) - Method in class Game.UI.GridPanel
Initializes the game grid for ships
isAlive() - Method in class Game.Logic.GridSquare
Returns the status of the ship part at this location.
isPlayer() - Method in class Game.Logic.GridSquare
Returns true if square belongs to the player, false if belongs to system

L

LogPanel - Class in Game.UI
This class is displays the history log for guesses, option selections, and general info to the user
LogPanel() - Constructor for class Game.UI.LogPanel
 

M

R

randomizeShipLocations() - Method in class Game.Logic.GameState
Places a varying number of ships in random locations on the board.
resizeGrid(int) - Method in class Game.Logic.GameState
Resizes the grid to a new dimension and resets the state of the grid

S

setAlive(boolean) - Method in class Game.Logic.GridSquare
Changes the status of the grid square
SQUARE_DIMENSION - Static variable in class Game.UI.GridPanel

U

update(Observable, Object) - Method in class Game.Battleship
Updates the main Battleship board, primarily used when the state of the game has changed and may need to be repainted.
updateHistoryPanel(String) - Method in class Game.Logic.GameState
Updates the history log for the game with the provided message
updateLogPanel(String) - Method in class Game.UI.LogPanel
Updates the log window with a new entry
Utils - Class in Game
This class contains methods to perform useful operations or actions used by multiple classes in the project

V

validateGuess(boolean, int, int) - Method in class Game.Logic.GameState
Validates a player's/system's guess by checking if the grid contains a ship or not
